article:
'Breaking' may refer to: *Breaking (martial arts), a martial arts skill
*Breaking (dancing) (or b-boying), a street dance style *Breaking Bad - TV
series *Breaking Benjamin - a post grunge rock band *Vowel breaking, a
historical linguistics term *[[Breakin']], a 1984 movie *"Breakin'... There's No
Stopping Us", a song by Ollie & Jerry from the Breakin'soundtrack *[[Breakin' 2:
Electric Boogaloo]] *"Breakin'" (song) from The Music's Welcome to the North
*"Breaking" (song), a song by the band Anberlin off their album New Surrender
*"Breaking" (album), an album by American singer-songwriter Brian Larsen *Horse
breaking *Housebreaking *Sabbath breaking *Supersymmetry breaking *Soft SUSY
breaking *Sequence breaking *Ship breaking *Strike breaking *Breaking news

'Breaking' may also be used for: *Spring breaking, the act of vacationing on
spring break *Use of break (music)
